Dating: 27TH DYNASTY AND CONTEMPORARIES (not before); 30TH DYNASTY (not after)
Name: Stela of Mut-hetepty
Description: Poorly worked stela displaying the classic layout of the Late Period: a lunette with winged sun disc and two reclining jackals, an offering scene before Osiris, Isis and Nephthys, with an offering table and the female owner of the stela, and then the offering formula. The surface of the stela has only been coarsely polished. There are traces of red paint.
